title: The National Plantation Awards Ceremony 2012
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) The National Plantation Awards Ceremony 2012, the first of its kind in Sri Lanka was held at Temple Trees recently under the patronage of President Mahinda Rajapaksa. The award ceremony was being held to recognize the contribution made to the national economy by the growers,…
